thread.title: Seven killed, around 50 wounded in Burkina Faso attack - government spokesman

title: Seven killed, around 50 wounded in Burkina Faso attack - government spokesman
text: March 2, 2018 / 3:05 PM / Updated an hour ago Seven killed, around 50 wounded in Burkina Faso attack - government spokesman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read OUAGADOUGOU (Reuters) - Unidentified assailants killed five people and wounded around 50 others during an attack on Burkina Fasoâ€™s military headquarters in the capital Ouagadougou on Friday, said government spokesman Remi Dandjinou. Men escape from Burkina Faso's army headquarters during an attack in the capital Ougadougou, Burkina Faso March 2, 2018. REUTERS/Anne Mimault Speaking on state television, he said that two paramilitary gendarmes were also killed defending the French embassy, which also came under attack. Reporting by Nadoun Coulibaly; Writing by Joe Bavier; Editing by Edward McAllister
